body.name: ComHoma Ergonomic Office Chair, Executive Mesh Desk Chair with Adjustable Arm Rests and Lumbar Support - High Back with Breathable Mesh Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Reclines Grey
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
features: Ergonomic Office Chair with Reclining Backrest: It takes less time to find the most comfortable Angle you like, benefiting from the rocking backrest. Moreover, this back support desk chair designed with 3 lockable Angles (90°, 120°, 130°) allow for free switch between working, relaxing and sleeping modes.

Mesh Task Chair with Clothes Hanger & Flexible Casters: The mesh executive chair is equipped with a clothes hanger, it effectively prevents your apparel from wrinkle, bringing much convenience in your daily life. And 5 smooth rolling wheels, ensuring a quieter movement and causing less damage to the floor.

Home Office Desk Chair for Long Time Sitting: The high back ergonomic chair perfectly conforms to your body curve, which is specially designed for office workers sitting for extended period of time. Extremely alleviate back pain and reduce the tiredness of your body.

Height Adjustable Mesh Office Chair with: The high-density mesh is resistant to abrasion for long-term use. Full mesh seat and backrest promote air flow. Meanwhile, this executive chair designed with headrest and adjustable lumbar support, which is more ergonomic.

Easy to Assemble and Warranty: Detailed instructions can guide you to assemble them together within ten minutes. ComHoma promises that you will enjoy a 1-year free after-sales service after purchase our office chair.We focus on customer experience, please don't hesitate to contact us if you need any help or any detail information, we will reply you asap we will receive your email.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This chair offers a lot of lumbar support which I needed. The armrests are smooth which is comfortable, but when I put my arms on them, the back of my arms touch the back of the seat. The seat is a little rough, so it is uncomfortable. I live in a hot climate and wanted a mesh seat, as well as, a mesh back. The mesh is a bit rough or grabby. I do feel like I am either getting used to it or my clothing fibers are sticking to it and making it softer. It isn't so bad for my shirts, but when I wear shorts, my skin is not a fan of the mesh. I have resorted to putting a hand towel right where my legs touch. Not what I really wanted to have to do, but because the mesh is so grabby, the towel stays in place, so it is working out. I hope that I get used to the mesh or it gets softer with time. The headrest is nice for me, but I am only 5'5". I had a much taller friend use it and he could not get the headrest to workout for him. A chair is not easy to buy online, but I am mostly satisfied with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this chair! Have never purchased a chair before without trying it out first but decided to try this and happy I did. This chair fits me better than any of my previous chairs. I like the footrest and lumbar support. Easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this is a comfortable and supportive char. However, the headrest is a bit awkward and sits much too low even on the highest setting. That pushes your upper back forward and ruins the posture youre hoping for. Works great without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and support 5 stars!
reviews.reviewText: It arrived quickly. My husband put it together and said it was easy. I got home and saw it waiting for me. The first sit... oh my, very comfortable. The back support is on point. The head rest is adjustable and when sitting back to relax it's so great. One month later I am still happy with my chair. The chair works for my size I'm 5'6" 200 lbs wide hips and I have wiggle room. The mesh design is comfortable for long periods of time. I work 10hrs a day from home and no pain from sitting. The chair I had BEFORE this one was made with cushion seating and it made my bottom hurt after an hour or so. I remember using extra pillows to Mt old chair just to get me through the day. Now that I have this chair.... Game changer! The built in suit hanger in the back is a cool feature too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good chair, cheap material but does the job
reviews.reviewText: The chair was easy to assemble, instructions were hidden under the seat. Chair had tons of support it felt like the 1500$ Herman Miller ergo chair we use at the office but after a month of I would say 6 hours a day during the week and 10 hour sessions during the weekend the chair is showing some wear on the slack of the material. It still supports but not like it once did but I still feel comfortable after a long day. I am 6'1 and weigh 210lbs so I do cover about 80% of the weight limit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars comfortable but broke fast
reviews.reviewText: The chair is comfortable and easy to put together however the gas chamber that allows the chair to move up and down broke after only 3 months and the chair bottoms out, no I am not heavy I weigh 150 LBS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Home Office chair
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this chair. During Covid my company allowed me to bring their very expensive ergonomic office chair home, but as we went back to the office on a hybrid schedule we had to return all company equipment. I bought this chair for my home office and am very pleased with it. Its comfortable, sturdy and the mesh back and seat helps keep me cool. I would definitely recommend it.
